name: Castaway 2
summary: Castaway 2 takes the very popular, award winning Castaway game to a whole new level! Stranded on a mysterious island, it is up to you to find a way off. Embark on a journey that takes you through vast terrains and unique environments, completing quests and battling huge bosses. Train pets, as they fight by your side using their unique skills and abilities. Discover and unlock rare items and equipment, using the brand new crafting system.
info:
• 中文名: 荒岛英雄2
  • 平台: PC
  • 游戏类型: ARPG
  • 游戏引擎: FLASH
